bio: An impatient Yo-kai who's always antsy. You'll find him first in line whenever anything new is released.

soultimate.name: Abrupt Punch
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops foe's Attack by 30% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Damage nearby foes. Attack is briefly decreased.

skill.effect: All stats down 3 minutes after mission starts.
skill.name: Me First!

name: K'mon-K'mon
